Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in metallic bouclé
Product.Description: A true design icon the pencil skirt meticulously shaped and seamed to figure-flattering perfection. Rendered in a stunning metallic bouclé for a touch of texture and a hint of shimmer. Wool/poly. Sits at waist. Back zip. Back vent. Fully lined. 23 1/2" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Scallop sateen skirt
Product.Description: Polished and pretty we trimmed the top of this pleated skirt with a feminine scalloped edge. Crafted from cotton sateen with a hint of stretch for dress-up, dress-down versatility. A-line skirt. Sits at waist. Side zip. Slant pockets. Fully lined. 17 1/2" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in basket-weave tweed
Product.Description: A true design icon the pencil skirt meticulously shaped and seamed to figure-flattering perfection. Fashioned in our favorite mix of vivid color and lightweight textured tweed, it's an office-worthy pick to pair with tights right now or to wear solo when warmer days are here. Cotton/rayon. Sits at waist. Back zip. Back vent. Fully lined. 22" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Stripe sweater-skirt
Product.Description: Sleek, striped and to the point in a curve-hugging pencil silhouette and an easygoing sweater knit. Wear it alone on warmer days or over tights when the temperature drops. Rayon/cotton.Sits at waist. Patch pockets. 21 1/2" long. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Petite No. 2 pencil skirt in basket-weave tweed

Product.Name: Pleated A-line skirt in Ashbury floral
Product.Description: Long pleats give this A-line skirt plenty of movement and a languid, pretty drape. Fashioned in a vivid vintage floral we fine-tuned from a favorite '70s caftan we think it's exactly the right amount of retro. Silk. Sits above waist. Fully lined. 24 1/2" long. Import.

Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in waterfloral
Product.Description: A true design icon the pencil skirt meticulously shaped and seamed to figure-flattering perfection. Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in midnight tweed

Product.Name: Gimlet skirt in coaster stripe
Product.Description: A festive fan of pleats along the waist renders this classic A-line skirt a sophisticated pick for all your invitations of the season. We can't get enough of its ladylike length. The best part? We fashioned it in alternating transparent and opaque stripes, just like the vintage dress one of our stylists sported around the office to rave reviews. Nylon/cotton. A-line shape. Sits above waist. Fully lined. 21" long. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in glen plaid
Product.Description: A true design icon the pencil skirt meticulously shaped and seamed to figure-flattering perfection. Product.Name: Classic mini in felted wool

Product.Name: Swish skirt

Product.Name: Polka-dot pencil skirt
Product.Description: Our designers carefully selected this refined silk and linen fabric for its crisp, classic feel the perfect match for modern pop art-inspired polka dots. Long and lean in an elegant pencil shape with a pair of thoughtfully placed pleats at the front for an enviable drape. Pencil skirt shape. Sits above waist. Back zip. Back vent. Fully lined. 22 1/2" long. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Gimlet skirt in tinsel tweed

Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in double-serge cotton
Product.Description: A true design icon the pencil skirt meticulously shaped and seamed to figure-flattering perfection. Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in tinsel tweed
Product.Description: A true design icon the pencil skirt meticulously shaped and seamed to figure-flattering perfection. Sits at waist. Back zip. Back vent. Fully lined. 23 1/2" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Flair skirt in double-serge wool
Product.Description: A special stitching technique lends this feminine silhouette a weightier drape that couldn't be more perfect for colder days. With becoming box pleats in a swingy, to-the-knee length that nods to vintage but feels completely of the moment. Wool. Full A-line shape. Sits at waist. Contour waistband. Buttons down front. Fully lined. 22" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Crosstown wool flannel circle skirt
Product.Description: Cut a charismatic figure in this A-line skirt, fashioned in always-stylish wool flannel. Its slightly gathered waistline and swingy skirt are great company for this season's boots and brogues, making it the perfect getup for gallivanting around town. Sits above waist. Cargo pockets. Fully lined. 27" long. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Sparkler skirt in tinsel lace
Product.Description: Festive and flowy, this one's a showstopper. A smartly banded waist and a versatile, just-above-the-knee length transition seamlessly from office hours to cocktail hour. Nylon/metallic threads. Sits above waist. Fully lined. 21 1/2" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Swish skirt in plaid
Product.Description: We love taking a classic style and adding an unexpected twist. This skirt is a perfect example: With a flattering banded waist dressed with raw-edged ruching, it feels completely of the moment. Silk. Slight A-line shape. Sits at waist. Contour waistband. Fully lined. 21 1/2" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Interoffice skirt in bird's-eye tweed
Product.Description: We're loving longer hems this season, from pants and party dresses to this lean and lovely pencil skirt. Thanks to meticulous seaming and a ruler-straight shape, this calf-length number feels svelte instead of stodgy. Crafted in a beautifully textured bird's-eye tweed version of our four-season Super 120s merino wool. Why so super? 120 is the measure of the yarn, and since 120 is one of the finest, our fabric boasts a silky-smooth finish and a refined drape. Sits at natural waist. Back zip. Slant pockets. Back vent. Fully lined. 27" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Cargo circle skirt
Product.Description: Your go-to, all-occasion skirt has arrived. Sublime in richly hued silk shantung, we're loving its ladylike midi length, flattering waist tie and unexpected patch pockets perfect for stashing your lipstick before you rush out the door. A-line shape. Sits above waist. Bow at waistband. Fully lined. 31 1/2" long. Import.

Product.Name: Sterling skirt in double-serge wool
Product.Description: Love it for its clean lines and flattering drape. Reach for it time and again because its '50s-inspired A-line tailoring and longer length feel so new. Wool. Sits at waist. Back zip. Welt pockets. Fully lined. 25" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Silk kick pleat skirt
Product.Description: A skirt we're absolutely smitten with. Made of a luxe mix of silk and wool, with a cool kick-pleat down the front, it's the perfect match for a lean cashmere sweater or a polished tucked-in shirt. A-line shape. Sits above waist. On-seam pockets. Fully lined. 25" long. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import.

Product.Name: Two-tone circle skirt
Product.Description: An elegant nod to vintage in a long and lofty silhouette, with gentle shirring at the waist that keeps things fresh and feminine. Side zip. Slant pockets. Fully lined. 24" long. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean. Available at jcrew.com and the J.Crew Collection & Bridal Boutique at 769 Madison Avenue, NY.

Product.Name: Silk pleat skirt in crimson floral

Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in harvest tweed

Sits at waist. Back zip. Back vent. Fully lined. 23 1/2" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in royal paisley

Product.Name: Flair skirt in floating rose

Product.Name: Postage stamp mini in peacock tweed

Available at jcrew.com and the J.Crew Collection & Bridal Boutique at 769 Madison Avenue, NY.

Product.Name: Cavalry skirt

Garment-dyed for a hint of authentic fading and washed for softness so it drapes with a feminine fall. We love the longer length a nod to the '70s that feels so fresh and modern right now. Cotton. Slight A-line shape. Sits at waist. Belt and belt loops at waistband. 23 1/2" long. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Origami mini in peony

Product.Name: Paillette pastiche skirt

To create the magnificent tile effect, each paillette is meticulously placed and sewn by hand. Cotton. Pencil skirt shape. Hits above knee. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import.

Product.Name: Jardin skirt
Product.Description: Our designers reworked a traditionally flirty silhouette in a midlength shape that nods to vintage but feels completely of the moment. Our favorite part? Product.Name: Gold coin skirt

Product.Name: Summerstock maxiskirt
Product.Description: So soft and sultry in a delicious knit that skims the curves just so. We love the dramatic floor-sweeping silhouette the perfect canvas for dressing up or down. Rayon/spandex jersey. Straight skirt. Sits at hip. Adjustable drawstring at waist. Length: 40". Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Soiree skirt in teaberry floral
Product.Description: A wearable work of art rendered in floaty silk chiffon. This Impressionist-inspired style is finished with elegant pleats and a cummerbund waist, lending a tailored feel to the dreamy design. So sweet and versatile in an A-line shape that's easily dressed up or down. Sits below waist. Back zip. Fully lined. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Merino lace skirt
Product.Description: We took our famous Italian merino wool yarn and gave it a chic new look by spinning it into lace. The result? An elegant wisp of a skirt you won't find anywhere else but here. In a 14-gauge knit. Side zip. 16 1/2" long. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Sequin long skirt
Product.Description: Score another one for our designers they've created the perfect embellished skirt. Oodles of tiny reflective sequins gild this classic A-line maxi skirt resulting in a true heirloom piece that'll steal the show for years to come. Silk. Back zip. Fully lined in silk chiffon. Falls to floor. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Pencil skirt in bi-stretch wool
Product.Description: Our perfected pencil skirt fitted and flattering made from our refined bi-stretch wool. Praised for its superslimming fit and strong snap-back recovery, bi-stretch wool stretches in both length and width to hug in all the right places. Wool/spandex. Sits at hip. Button-tabs at waist. Back zip. Back welt pockets. Back vent. Fully lined. 21" long. Import. Dry clean.

Product.Name: Duchesse satin ball skirt
Product.Description: For a black-tie affair or the mother of the bride, this sweeping ball skirt is a stunning alternative to a gown. Crafted in sumptuous duchesse satin, this skirt features a buoyant bubble hem, a back zip and rich, sophisticated colors. Cotton/silk. Fitted waist, inset waistband. On-seam pockets. Fully lined. Falls to floor. Part of J.Crew Collection. Import. Dry clean. Available at jcrew.com and the J.Crew Bridal Boutique at Madison Avenue, NY.

Product.Name: No. 2 pencil skirt in corduroy
Product.Description: Pencil this in: our classic leg-lengthening silhouette in perennially chic corduroy, updated with vertical front seams, a thinner waistband and a hint of stretch for an even slimmer, more flattering fit. Try it with a button-down, a henley or an embellished tee to nail that look of disheveled elegance we adore. Cotton with a hint of stretch. Pencil skirt shape. Sits at waist. Back zip. Back vents. 22" long. Hits above knee. Import. Machine wash.

Product.Name: Pencil skirt in superfine cotton
Product.Description: Our perfected pencil skirt fitted and flattering. The superfine yarn is made from a beautiful high-twist cotton that is siro spun to give it a hint of stretch. Sits at waist. Back zip. Back vent. Fully lined. 22 1/2" long. Import. Dry clean.
